author: morciuch
msg: Made GenericMVCPortlet cacheable by default (see Bugzilla bug# 20922).
Also, standardized the parameter to specify per-portlet time-to-live. It's should be "_TimeToLive" per documentation.

author: morciuch
msg: Correcting some performance problems with default security ref feature (see Bugzilla bug# 18885):
1. Default security was attempted to be retrieved regardless of whether default refs are defined in jr.props.
2. Entry parent registry lookup was made regardless of whether portlet has a
3. Redundant default security call was made in getPortlet(Entry entry). It calls
getPortletConfig which already retrieves default security.

author: morciuch
msg: Removed FONT style. It made stylesheet customization more difficult. No effect on the look and feel of Jetspeed.

author: morciuch
msg: Fixed typo in the preview link
